law.text: The Division of Correction may adopt regulations, applicable to each inmate who is employed in public work under this subtitle, that grant an additional good behavior allowance to the inmate conditioned on the inmate's good deportment and compliance with the regulations adopted by the Division of Correction for the management and control of inmates employed in public work.
